text:
Rongo-rongo is a tablet formerly carved on a driftwood or on a Sophora toromiro so-called "toromiro", but probaby main on a Thespesia populnea mako'i
Toromiro also is called a figurine made with wood of the same plant
Other websites.
[https://web.archive.org/web/20080625101810/http://pozdniakov.free.fr/14%20paques%201996.pdf Les bases des décchifrement de l'écriture de l'Ile de Paques]
